tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RetinaScanningData (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    left_eye_image BYTEA,
    right_eye_image BYTEA,
    scanning_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_id UUID 
);

CREATE TABLE UserDevices (
    device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_used TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UserDevices (
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES RetinaScanningData(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id INT,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    preference_value VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, preference_name),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserDevices(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RetinaScanData (
    user_id INT,
    scan_id INT,
    scan_data BYTEA,
    scan_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, scan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserDevices (
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES RetinaScanData(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserDevices(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceLogs (
    log_id SERIAL,
    device_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    PRIMARY KEY (log_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES UserDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserSettings (
    user_id INT,
    setting_name VARCHAR(50),
    setting_value VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, setting_name),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);
